summary: Comprehensive testing of CrucibAI workspace page with Monaco editor, Sandpack preview, file explorer, console, version history, voice input, file attachments, and LLM model selection. All core features working correctly. Backend APIs 100% passing (24/24 tests). AI code generation working with real LLM responses.

ui_bugs.issue: Made with Emergent badge overlays the submit button, blocking normal clicks. Requires force=True or Enter key to submit.
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can press Enter key to submit instead of clicking the button

passed_tests: Landing page loads with premium dark theme (bg-[#0A0A0B])
Chat input works on landing page
Clicking submit redirects to /workspace with prompt as query param
Workspace page loads with file explorer (App.js, index.js, styles.css)
Monaco code editor displays and edits code
Sandpack preview panel renders React components
Model selector dropdown opens and shows all options (Auto, GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini)
Voice input button exists and is clickable
File attachment button exists and is clickable
Console tab shows build logs placeholder
History tab shows version history (No versions yet / version list)
Export button exists and is clickable
/api/ai/chat endpoint works with all model selections (auto, gpt-4o, claude, gemini)
/api/auth/register creates new users with 50k welcome tokens
AI code generation produces working React code
action_items: Consider adjusting z-index of submit button or Made with Emergent badge to prevent overlay blocking
critical_code_review_comments: Workspace.jsx is 885 lines - consider splitting into smaller components (FileTree, ConsolePanel, ModelSelector, VersionHistory are already extracted which is good)
Voice transcription endpoint uses OpenAISpeechToText which may need error handling for unsupported audio formats
seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: All workspace features tested and working. Monaco editor, Sandpack preview, model selector, voice/file buttons, console, history tabs all functional. AI code generation produces working React code. Backend APIs fully tested with pytest. Minor UI issue: submit button can be blocked by Emergent badge overlay - use Enter key as workaround.
